subject: Tennis
Stadiums and Arenas
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The Singer Bowl, which was built for the 1964-65 World’s Fair, then divided and incorporated into the National Tennis Center, had an eclectic history before the United States Open.
snippet: The Singer Bowl, which was built for the 1964-65 World’s Fair, then divided and incorporated into the National Tennis Center, had an eclectic history before the United States Open.
